entries.abort: You have aborted the mission.  Mission Failed.
entries.angry_disable: You just wait until the Lady hears about this.
entries.arrival_phase_1: pcontrast3 Nirame: < pcontrast1 Good, you got there first.  By our calculations this should be a short wait. pcontrast3 >
entries.arrival_phase_2: pcontrast3 Nirame: < pcontrast1 Ask and you will receive.  Go do your thing. pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Hostile craft detected on attack vector. pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast3 Tactical computer: < pcontrast1 Hostile activity has ceased. pcontrast3 >
entries.capture_phase_1: You will not get away with this
entries.capture_phase_2: The signal has been sent, enjoy our hospitality
entries.escort_remaining: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 An escorting craft has been destroyed, %DI remain. pcontrast3 >
entries.escort_wiped_out: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 All escorting craft have been destroyed. pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_destroy: The freighter has been destroyed, you fail
entries.failed_escape: The freighter has escaped, you fail
entries.panic_1: Come get us brothers, don't let this fool get away
entries.panic_2: This was a mistake.  A grave mistake.
entries.panic_3: Come get us brothers, don't let this fool get away
entries.panic_4: Come get us brothers, don't let this fool get away
entries.panic_5: Come get us brothers, don't let this fool get away
entries.quest_disable_d: Destroy the targets engines to disable them
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the captured freighter out of the system
entries.quest_location_d: A trade route in the Endor System
entries.quest_recover_d: Pull up next to the disabled freighter to begin the capture process
entries.split_quest_alert: pcontrast3 Nirame: < pcontrast1 About that freighter we wanted: It is in route to Endor, perhaps you can convince them to alter course. pcontrast3 >
entries.target_disabled: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 The target has been disabled. pcontrast3 >
entries.thanks_1: Do you think that is all fool?
entries.thanks_2: There will be more, our wrath is limitless.
entries.thanks_3: Do you think that is all fool?
entries.thanks_4: Do you think that is all fool?
entries.thanks_5: Do you think that is all fool?
entries.title: Endor System: Capture the Valarian Mining Freighter
entries.title_d: Capture the Valarian Mining Freigher as it arrives in the Endor System.
